Package com.example.group1hrmsapp.service

Class TrainingModuleServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.group1hrmsapp.service.TrainingModuleServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TrainingModuleService
@Service
public class TrainingModuleServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrainingModuleService
Service implementation for managing training module operations. Provides functionalities to manage training modules such as fetching all training modules, getting a module by ID, creating, updating, and deleting a module. Also, includes functionalities related to marking trainings as completed, getting completed trainings of an employee, and other relevant operations.

    • prepareSpecification

      public org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<TrainingModule> prepareSpecification​(java.lang.String moduleName, java.lang.Boolean assigned, java.lang.Boolean completed)
      Prepares a Specification for the TrainingModule based on the given filters. This specification can then be used with JPA to fetch filtered results from the database.

      The filters can include:

      • The name of the module
      • Whether the training is assigned
      • Whether the training is completed

      Specified by:
      prepareSpecification in interface TrainingModuleService
      Parameters:
      moduleName - The name of the training module (partial names are matched).
      assigned - Flag indicating if the training is assigned (can be null).
      completed - Flag indicating if the training is completed (can be null).
      Returns:
      A Specification object that can be used to filter TrainingModule entities.

    • assignTraining

      @Transactional public void assignTraining​(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> employeeIds, java.lang.Long trainingId)
      Assigns a training module to multiple employees based on their IDs.
      Specified by:
      assignTraining in interface TrainingModuleService
      Parameters:
      employeeIds - List of employee IDs to whom the training is to be assigned.
      trainingId - The ID of the training module to be assigned.
